record.description: Lost a mitten or found a kitten near the University of Chicago? Chances are there's a note about it on this tree stump at 1311 E. 57th Street. Students started pinning notes on the tree in front of Woodworth's Book Store some time ago. Recently, when it became necessary to remove it, the top was cut off and the tall stump left as a bulletin board.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: A separate paper back with photograph information and a newspaper clipping has come loose from the image.
